title: I need a Bengali Typeface.
content:
I need a Bengali Typeface - can anyone suggest a decent source?

Thanks

Mik

We have some at Linotype, but we do not license them directly through our webshop at Linotype.com

If you us e-mail [info@linotype.com](mailto:info@linotype.com), the appropriate person should be able to discuss this with you.
